text:
it’s been almost 10 months since @_nightsweekends s4. 

i started building with @_buildspace in july. 

since then, here’s what happened: 

- i graduated from @humbercollege ✅

- took a break to work on startup (5 mo) ✅

- completed 10 mo in startup world ✅

- recently crossed amlost $10k in revenue ✅

- made cool frnds building even cooler stuff ✅

- passed 400k+ impressions ✅

in just 10 months, i am doing better than i was doinnn 40 weeks ago 🚀🚀

ps- i was making $10k as an immigrant for the whole yr workinn hard at walmart 

pps- now i m working even harder than i was used to work at walmart and making the same amnt but this time its for me 💪💪

btw if u still have doubts, clear it up and feel free to ask any questions or DM me as well if u need any help with ur project or journey too. 

bcz if i can do it,  u can do it do..

LFGGGG🔥🔥 

#buildinpublic

user_info.name: Kathan 𝕏
